Description: AWS SAM template for a serverless application with three Lambda functions (items, users, orders), DynamoDB tables, and API Gateway endpoints

Metadata.Comment: DynamoDB Table to store information about items. Configured with on-demand billing for automatic scaling and 'itemId' as the primary key.
DynamoDB Table to store information about users. Configured with on-demand billing for automatic scaling and 'userId' as the primary key.
DynamoDB Table to store information about orders. Configured with on-demand billing for automatic scaling and 'orderId' as the primary key.
Lambda function for handling item-related operations. It has inline Node.js code, environment variables, DynamoDB CRUD permissions, and is exposed via an API Gateway endpoint.
Lambda function for handling user-related operations. It has inline Node.js code, environment variables, DynamoDB CRUD permissions, and is exposed via an API Gateway endpoint.
Lambda function for processing and managing e-commerce orders. It has inline Node.js code, environment variables, DynamoDB CRUD permissions, and is exposed via an API Gateway endpoint.

ApiGatewayUrl.Description: URL of the deployed API Gateway

ItemsTableName.Description: Name of the Items DynamoDB table

UsersTableName.Description: Name of the Users DynamoDB table

OrdersTableName.Description: Name of the Orders DynamoDB table

ItemsFunctionArn.Description: ARN of the Items Lambda function

UsersFunctionArn.Description: ARN of the Users Lambda function

OrdersFunctionArn.Description: ARN of the Orders Lambda function
